content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** competed at the [2017 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games](/wiki/2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games) held in [Ashgabat](/wiki/Ashgabat), [Turkmenistan](/wiki/Turkmenistan) from September 17 to 27. Singapore sent 8 competitors for the multi-sport event. Singapore clinched its only medal in the Muay Thai women's 54kg event. ## Participants SportMenWomenTotal[Belt wrestling](/wiki/Belt_wrestling_at_the_2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games)101[Chess](/wiki/Chess_at_the_2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games)011[Dancesport](/wiki/Dancesport_at_the_2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games)112[Muaythai](/wiki/Muay_Thai_at_the_2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games)011[Wrestling](/wiki/Wrestling_at_the_2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games)213 ## Medallists MedalNameSportEvent BronzeGwa Wei Ying[MuayThai](/wiki/Muay_Thai_at_the_2017_Asian_Indoor_and_Martial_Arts_Games)women's 51kg This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore at the 2017 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games
